xBox Gamepad Encoder (kade-xbox)

pin function shifted function notes mapable input- advanced mode only
A1 Dpad up Analog Up Use shift to switch between dpad and left analog stick y
A2 Dpad down Analog Down y
A3 Dpad left Analog Left y
A4 Dpad right Analog Right y
A5 Trigger left Left Thumb Button Use shift to switch between triggers and thumb buttons y
A6 Trigger right Right Thumb Button y
A7 *Shift status LED   Connect external LED to these pins y
A8 *Connectivity Status LED   y
A9 *Analog Gaming in Shift Mode   Connecting a jumper wire between this pin and ground will enable analog gaming in shift mode. All buttons will map to normal functions with the exception of A1 to A4. y
A10 *Disable Start + Back   Connecting a jumper wire between this pin and ground will disable the start+back combination. The dedicated Exit Game pin is not effected. y
B1 A Button     y
B2 B Button     y
B3 X Button     y
B4 Y Button     y
B5 Black Invert Y Axis Use shift+black to Invert Y axis on analog sticks y
B6 White Toggle Left/Right Stick Use shift+white to toggle between controlling left and right analog sticks y
B7 Start     y
B8 Back     y
B9 Exit Game Exit to Dashboard Dedicated game exit (simulates start+back) and dashboard exit (simulates LT+RT+black+back). This pin can also be held for 5 seconds to force Exit to Dashboard y
B10     Unused y
HWB Shift   Press to access shifted functions. Double click for shift lock n
+5V +5V Power   +5V power for external peripherals n
RST Reset   Restart the device n
Ground Ground   Ground pin. Recommend a daisy chain ground harness is used for wiring controls. n
